properties.entry: SELECT P.PRODUCT_NAME , P.COMPANY_PRICE , P.TRADE_COUNT , P.STATUS , P.IMG_PATH , B.BRAND_NAME FROM( SELECT P.PRODUCT_NAME , P.COMPANY_PRICE , P.TRADE_COUNT , P.STATUS , P.BRAND_NO , PIMG.IMG_PATH FROM PRODUCT P FULL OUTER JOIN PRODUCT_IMG PIMG ON (P.PRODUCT_NAME = PIMG.PRODUCT_NAME) ORDER BY P.TRADE_COUNT DESC) P JOIN BRAND B ON (P.BRAND_NO = B.BRAND_NO) WHERE ROWNUM <= 3 AND STATUS = 'Y'
